What are the treatments for deoxyguanosine kinase deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of deoxyguanosine kinase deficiency:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: DGUOK-Related Mitochondrial DNA Depletion Syndrome, Hepatocerebral Form  - Genetic Testing Registry: Mitochondrial DNA-depletion syndrome 3, hepatocerebral  - MedlinePlus Enc
